name: Sumadhura Aspire Aurum
desc: Located in the heart of Whitefield in Bangalore is a masterfully designed community of 326 beautiful apartments called Aurum, it is launched by acclaimed real estate developer Sumadhura Infracon Pvt Ltd. The complex spread over a total area of 2.6 acres is offering meticulously crafted, comfortable and spacious 1 and 2 BHK apartments. Super built-up area of 1 BHK apartments is 505 sq ft. and for 2 BHK apartments it is 955 sq ft. A number of amenities are added to the housing which bring comfort, joy, rejuvenation to its residents. One eight passenger and one thirteen passenger lift of Schindler or Johnson or equivalent make for each wing. They are fitted with auto rescue device with V3F for energy efficiency, power back-up, car parking areas, softened water made available through an exclusive water treatment plant in case of bore water, sewage treatment plant of adequate capacity as per norms will be provided inside the project, treated sewage water will be used for the landscaping /flushing purpose and other essential facilities are available in the premises. A well-equipped clubhouse offers ground multipurpose hall, party lawn, adult pool, kids pool, pool deck area, change rooms & carom, chess, foose ball, air hockey on ground floor, first floor houses gymnasium, yoga and meditation area and aerobics. Open area amenities included tree court with seating lawn, jogging track, cycle track, visitor parking, skating rink, dribble court, elder zone with seating, sand pit with children's play area, synthetic mat with children's play equipment, amphitheater stage with feature wall, cycle stand, outdoor library with seating, drop off zone, reflexology path, hopscotch, skating park, pavilion with seating, pergola and tree grove. Apartments are constructed with care to ensure proper space utilization and inflow of natural light and breeze. Specifications included in the apartments are smooth putty finish with two coats of Tractor emulsion paint for interior walls, one coat primer and two coats of external emulsion paint on exterior walls, ceramic tiles up to 2 feet height above platform on kitchen walls, glazed tiles up to 7 feet height above platform on bathroom walls, vitrified tiles flooring in living room, bedrooms, kitchen and bathrooms, rustic tiles flooring in balconies, concealed copper electric wiring with essential points, wall mounted WC with health faucet in bathrooms, branded CP fittings in kitchen, C.P fittings of Jaguar or Cera or equivalent make in bathrooms, hard wood frames and skin molded door, premium UPVC windows systems with safety grill and provision for mosquito mesh, UPVC French door systems with sliding shutters with provision for mosquito mesh, solid cement concrete block masonry and R.C.C. framed structure to withstand wind & seismic loads as per IS code. Special focus is given on safety and security of residents with the following features round the clock security system, intercom facility to all apartments connecting to security room, panic button and intercom is provided in the lifts, solar power fencing around the compound and surveillance cameras at the main security and entrance of each wing. Aurum is located in the prominent area of Whitefield in Bangalore. It is a sought after area among home buyers as it houses a number of IT parks. The area has a robust infrastructure with many reputed schools, educational institutes, and hospitals established here. Some well-known schools and institutes in the area are VIBGYOR, MVJ College of Engineering, Deen Academy, Greenwood High School, Delhi Public School, Whitefield Global School, Ryan International School and others. Some Popular Hospitals in the locality are Sathya Sai Super Speciality Hospital, Narayan Multispecialty Hospital, Vydehi Hospital, Shankara Eye Hospital, Yashomati Hospital, Cloud 9 Clinic, Columbia Asia and others. Malls and restaurants like Park Square Mall, Forum Value Mall, Inorbit Mall, Phoenix Mall add to the fun of living in the area. Banks and other utility shops are also located in the vicinity for the convenience of residents. It is a comfortable area to own a residential place. Aurum will be ready by December 2022 for possession. It will be a delight to own your dream home in Aurum.

name: SBR Pravanika
desc:
Imagine a place that is perfectly balanced in every facet of living. Perfectly designed with harmonious alignment between East and West for breathtaking sunrises and sunsets. An unbeatable location, equally close to work, schools, hospitals, and everything that makes life joyful. Thoughtfully constructed so there are no common walls, and perfectly compliant with the principles of Vaastu for natural light and ventilation. And of course, lifestyle amenities aesthetically crafted to elevate the senses to a higher plane of consciousness. Welcome to Pravanika.

Perfectly Located - The best place to live is where everything is within arm’s reach. That’s why Pravanika is placed to ensure you have equal proximity to all you need. Tech parks, hospitals, schools, shopping malls, and so much more. The thriving Old Madras Road region has grown at remarkable pace, and will continue to do so making your home not only a great place to live, but a smart investment in your future.

Perfectly Planned - Every aspect of your future home is the result of meticulous forethought, drafting, and execution. Right from the boutique size of the community all the way up to the luxurious array of amenities on the rooftop, the flawless planning will leave you wanting for nothing. To live at Pravanika is to truly find your place in the sun.

Perfect Living - Homes at Pravanika are designed to perfection, and make everyday life seem more than ordinary. The influence of Vaastu compliance takes the form of spacious rooms, well lit by the natural radiance of the sun, and cooled by idyllic breezes that make for wonderful ventilation.

Perfectly Vaastu Compliant - The architectural principles of Vaastu come to life at Pravanika, where directional values enable remarkable design. These time-tested principles allow the perfect balance of sunlight and natural ventilation to combine into a wholesome atmosphere filled with positive vibes and abundant energy.

Perfectly Breezy - At Pravanika, the wind is your constant companion, filling every room with refreshing air and creating pleasant whispers of ventilation. The thoughtfully crafted unit plans and directional design create the perfect harmony of the natural elements that caress each corner of your home with its gentle touch.

Perfect Greenery - The soothing calm of natural greenery surrounds you at every corner when you live at Pravanika. Right from the lush green zone that surrounds the entire development to the rooftop garden, you will always be nurtured in the gentle embrace of Mother Nature.

Elevated to Perfection - Pravanika takes modern living to new heights, and not just as a figure of speech. The rooftop is adorned with a lavish spread of lifestyle amenities, including the opulent Sky Lounge, a stunning infinity pool, a world class health club, and a tranquil sitout deck to enjoy breathtaking sunrises and sunsets.

Perfectly Aligned - Pravanika is designed to emulate the path of the sun, aligned perfectly from East to West. Every home can experience radiant sunrises and calming sunsets in all their glory, since there are no high rise buildings to either side.

name: Unique Feronia
desc:
Unique Feronia is a row house project designed on the theme of self sustainability concept. This is India’s first fully solar powered housing project. We at UF generate electricity harnessing the sun's solar energy.

UF uses Eco-friendly, reliable and very strong- Stabilized Hydraulic pressed mud blocks (SMB). These bricks are interlinked and dense so they have two times more load bearing capacity than the conventional bricks.. It also acts as an insulator from external temperature and adds up aesthetic values.

The garbage is not a problem anymore. The dry and wet wastes are separated at source so that the wet waste is converted into manure/compost to grow organic fruits & vegetable and in our gardens across our project. The dry waste is handed over to the vendor/recycling from time to time.

The Rain water is collected through rain water harvesting system which can be used for many purposes. Apart from this the water that comes out of our kitchen and bathrooms are thoroughly processed in our advanced STP and is reused for gardening and other purposes.

All the vehicles are parked in the basement, a dedicated closed parking area without allowing it to the residential zone to keep it free from pollution and safe.

An indoor swimming pool not just conserves water but also saves electricity.

The UNIQUE ADVANTAGES:

MAINTENANCE ADVANTAGE: The components that make up the maintenance cost in the future are mainly electricity and water. The above concept not only addresses the environmental issues but also reduces the maintenance cost up to 50% compared to any other conventional housing projects.

SPACE ADVANTAGE: This 2 acre project comprises only 63 units giving you an highest advantage of bigger UDS, which is upto 80% double compared to an apartment.

COST ADVANTAGE: Good news for home seekers. Govt. has slashed the GST for houses under construction from 12% to 5%. As a result the price for our Unique homes comes down drastically. Cost of a 1467 sft (SBA) villament will cost just ?58 Lakhs (all inclusive price).

Not just these advantages, UF has luxury of a 11500 sft club house loaded with all Amenities:

• Indoor Swimming Pool
• Basket Ball Court (outdoor)
• Cricket Net (outdoor)
• GYM
• Indoor Kids Play Area
• Outdoor Kids Play Area
• Jogging Track
• Elderly park
• Party hall/Multipurpose hall
• Reading Room
• Boundary with Organic Trees
• Organic Vegetable Garden
• Gazebo
• Solar Street Lights
• Power Backup
• Security & CCTV Surveillance
• Fully Wi-Fi enabled
